 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוּעַ‎</span> **verb** ==quiver, wave, waver, tremble, totter== (Late Hebrew Pilpal <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִעְנַע‎</span> ***shake***, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נוּעַ‎</span> ***waver, stagger*** (rare); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bend*** (of boughs), see commotus fuit (of ***id.***), so [[BDB#Kam|Kam]] [[BDB#Frey|Frey]]; also ***change***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***kind, species, variety***; [[BDB#Di|Di]] compare Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***hunt***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָ֫עוּ‎</span> [[Job.28.4|Job 28:4]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנָע֫וּ‎</span> [[Amos.4.8|Amos 4:8]] + 2 t.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫נַע‎</span> [[Isa.7.2|Isa 7:2]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּנוּעַ‎</span> [[Isa.24.20|Isa 24:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲנוּעֲךָ‎</span> [[2Sam.15.20|2Sam 15:20]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] (but read [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] Hiph\`il q. v.); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָנ֫וּעוּ‎</span> [[Ps.109.10|Ps 109:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְנוּע֑וּן‎</span> [[Ps.59.16|Ps 59:16]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] (so read; not [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] Hiph\`il), etc.; ***Infinitive absolute*** [[Isa.24.20|Isa 24:20]]; [[Ps.109.10|Ps 109:10]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוּעַ‎</span> [[Judg.9.9|Judg 9:9]] +3 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺעַ‎</span> [[Isa.7.2|Isa 7:2]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָע‎</span> [[Gen.4.12|Gen 4:12]]; [[Gen.4.14|Gen 4:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָעִים‎</span> [[Prov.22.19|Prov 22:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָעוֺת‎</span> [[1Sam.1.13|1Sam 1:13]]: — 

**1.** ***wave***, of trees, followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> [[Judg.9.9|Judg 9:9]]; [[Judg.9.11|Judg 9:11]]; [[Judg.9.13|Judg 9:13]] followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְּנֵי‎</span> of cause [[Isa.7.2|Isa 7:2]] ***quiver, vibrate***, of lips [[1Sam.1.13|1Sam 1:13]] ***swing*** (to and fro) of miners [[Job.28.4|Job 28:4]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דלל‎</span>); ***stagger*** like drunkard, of mariners in storm [[Ps.107.27|Ps 107:27]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חגג‎</span>), compare [[Isa.29.9|Isa 29:9]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁכר‎</span>); hence ***be unstable***, figurative of ways of harlot [[Prov.5.6|Prov 5:6]] ***tremble***, of doorposts, [[Isa.6.4|Isa 6:4]] (followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> causative ), idols [[Isa.19.1|Isa 19:1]] (followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְּנֵי‎</span>), earth [[Isa.24.20|Isa 24:20]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎התנודד‎</span>), people [[Exod.20.18|Exod 20:18]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); figurative of heart [[Isa.7.2|Isa 7:2]]. 

**2.** ***totter, go tottering*** (faint and uncertain) [[Lam.4.14|Lam 4:14]] v[[Lam.4.15|Lam 4:15]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוּץ‎</span>), [[Amos.8.12|Amos 8:12]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוטט‎</span>); as beggars [[Ps.109.10|Ps 109:10]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁאֵל‎</span>), compare [[Ps.59.16|Ps 59:16]]; [[Amos.4.8|Amos 4:8]] followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span>; ***participle vagabond*** [[Gen.4.12|Gen 4:12]]; [[Gen.4.14|Gen 4:14]] (both \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָד‎</span>); figurative = ***err, sin***, [[Jer.14.10|Jer 14:10]]. **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִנּוֺעַ‎</span> [[Amos.9.9|Amos 9:9]] ***be tossed about*** (of corn) in a sieve; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִנּוֺעוּ‎</span> ***id.***, of bulwarks as fig-trees [[Nah.3.12|Nah 3:12]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נפל‎</span>). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵנִ֫יעָה‎</span> [[2Kgs.19.21|2Kgs 19:21]] = [[Isa.37.22|Isa 37:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַהֲנִָֽעוֺתִ֫י‎</span> [[Amos.9.9|Amos 9:9]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָנִיעַ‎</span> [[Zeph.2.15|Zeph 2:15]] jussive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָ֫נַע‎</span> [[2Kgs.23.18|2Kgs 23:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲנִיעֲךָ‎</span> [[2Sam.15.20|2Sam 15:20]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] (compare **Qal**); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְנִיעוּן‎</span> [[Ps.109.25|Ps 109:25]] + [[Ps.59.16|Ps 59:16]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] (read [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] **Qal** q. v. ), etc.; ***Imperative*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲנִיעֵ֫מוֺ‎</span> [[Ps.59.12|Ps 59:12]] — 

**1.** ***toss about*** [[Amos.9.9|Amos 9:9]] subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, object Israel followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּגּוֺיִם‎</span> (compare **Niph\`al**). 

**2.** ***shake, cause to totter:*** = ***set me tottering*** [[Dan.10.10|Dan 10:10]] ***on my knees and hands***; especially ***shake*** or ***wag*** the head, in mockery [[2Kgs.19.21|2Kgs 19:21]] = [[Isa.37.22|Isa 37:22]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בוז‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לעג‎</span>) compare [[Ps.22.8|Ps 22:8]]; [[Ps.109.25|Ps 109:25]] followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> [[Job.16.4|Job 16:4]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּמוֺ ר‎</span> [[[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:119q»§ 119q</sup>]), also [[Lam.2.15|Lam 2:15]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁרק‎</span>), [[Zeph.2.15|Zeph 2:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָדוֺ‎</span> (\|\| ***id.***), [see also [[Eccl.12.18|Eccl 12:18]]; [[Eccl.13.7|Eccl 13:7]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּר‎</span>)]. 

**3.** (***shake***), ***disturb***, bones of dead [[2Kgs.23.18|2Kgs 23:18]]. 

**4.** ***cause to wander*** [[Num.32.13|Num 32:13]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); [[2Sam.15.20|2Sam 15:20]] (followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ללכת‎</span>); [[Ps.59.12|Ps 59:12]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הוריד‎</span>, for which [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Proph. Chald. xlviii.</sup> proposes <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הניד‎</span>).
